title: Can't Login to League of Legends
body:
Hey guys, been having an issue logging in to LoL for the last 3 days. I can open the Client, I put in my user details however when i press the login button it will just keep showing the logging on status an does nothing except for an error message at the end which directs me to this link https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944 

I have Disabled Firewalls, I have opened Ports with TCP/UDP (80 - 443 - 2099 - 5000/5500 - 8393/8400) I have done everything the league of legends login issue guides tell me to do an still nothing.

I have noticed I cannot login to any other Platforms/Servers either like example ''Steam''.

I have tired a different computer in the same house an the same thing is happening.

I have contacted my ISP (Telstra Bigpond) they got a technician to come down an that did not help either.

IF anyone has ever experienced something like this before please help me out! will appreciate it heaps.

replies.body:
Hey,
I replied to your other post [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/6nsIb1HL-cant-login-with-home-internet).
Can riot at least acknowledge that this is still an issue? It's been a week now
stamati, eisai me telstra kai esi?
Yeah using Telstra, Mobile internet (Optus) works fine
Stamati I think the problem is with the modem. Telstra wont be helping me out replacing it. So im changing to optus next week.. Im sure it will work if i change my ISP

what do you get when you run 
(tracert 103.240.227.5) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

here is a part of mine:

  3    10 ms    26 ms     9 ms  CPE-58-175-61-14.vic.bigpond.net.au [58.175.61.14] 
  4    10 ms    18 ms     9 ms  58.160.7.226 
  5    10 ms     9 ms    10 ms  172.18.117.70 
  6     9 ms    10 ms    11 ms  172.18.117.77 
  7    12 ms    12 ms    13 ms  bundle-ether4.lon-edge902.melbourne.telstra.net [203.50.76.12] 
  8    12 ms    15 ms     9 ms  bundle-ether2.win-edge902.melbourne.telstra.net [203.50.11.116] 
  9    13 ms    11 ms    11 ms  bundle-ether12.win-core10.melbourne.telstra.net [203.50.11.111] 
 10    29 ms    31 ms    25 ms  bundle-ether12.ken-core10.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.11.122] 
 11    23 ms    23 ms    22 ms  bundle-ether1.ken-edge902.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.11.97] 
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.

and just times out after that, seems to be a problem in the lines somewhere in sydney
How do i find all this?

Hey SKT T1 Eternal,

I'm sorry to hear that you're having issues logging into League of Legends. If you've already tried the solutions in the Login Issues article, can you try the solutions provided in the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) Riot Games Support article?

Iv tried all that an nothing has helped me... I plugged in my phone an used its internet an it logged in fine. It has to do something with Telstra Bigpond since more users are having the same issue. Saying that I cant connect to Steam either or play any online games.

Interesting. The Troubleshooting Connection Issues article has information on how to send information to Riot so they can investigate. Be sure to send any information they ask for in that article (it's on the bottom of the article). Sorry I couldn't be of more help!
Telstra Doesn't know what the issue might be. Does anyone else have this issue?
